## Vector.outerProduct() method

Implements the outer product (matrix product) of two vectors

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
outerProduct(other: Vector<S>): Matrix<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  other | <code>Vector&lt;S&gt;</code> | The vector with which to calculate an outer product |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix<S>`

The outer product
